Title: Relates to establishing an interagency task force on hate crimes and domestic terrorism
Summary: Relates to establishing an interagency task force on hate crimes and domestic terrorism; requires an annual report to the governor and leaders of the legislature including data gathered by the task force on the nature, extent, and incidence of hate crimes and domestic terrorism in the state and a summary of any recommendations developed over the year to strengthen state and local prevention efforts and any other information deemed necessary.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to establishing an interagency task force on hate crimes and domestic terrorism
